verses.text: \w Save|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* enemies; \w secure|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* assailants.

\w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* those who do wrong, \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* bloodthirsty.

For see! They lay ambush for \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, strong men \w are|strong="H1818"\w* banded against \w me|strong="H3467"\w* \w not|strong="H3467"\w* for sin \w or|strong="H1818"\w* transgression \w of|strong="H1818"\w* mine, for \w no|strong="H6466"\w* \w guilt|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* mine, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*,

\w they|strong="H3588"\w* run \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* ready. Awake! Come forth \w to|strong="H3068"\w* meet \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w*!

\w You|strong="H7200"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* hosts, God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Israel, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*! \w And|strong="H7200"\w* punish \w the|strong="H7200"\w* proud, \w every|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1097"\w*; spare \w none|strong="H1097"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* traitors vile. \qs Selah\qs*

\w At|strong="H3478"\w* evening \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w*, howling \w like|strong="H3478"\w* dogs, \w make|strong="H2603"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w round|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city.

Look \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* venomous mouths, tongues \w like|strong="H1993"\w* swords, \w they|strong="H5892"\w* think no \w one|strong="H5892"\w* hears \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.
\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, laugh at \w them|strong="H8085"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* mock \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* insolent.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* strength, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sure retreat.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* God \w with|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* love \w will|strong="H5797"\w* meet \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* feast \w my|strong="H8104"\w* eyes \w on|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* foes.

Slay \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H7200"\w*, lest \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* forget, let \w your|strong="H7200"\w* hosts \w keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* roaming \w and|strong="H7200"\w* wandering.

\w In|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* sinful speech snare \w them|strong="H3381"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* trapped \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* pride, \w for|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* curses \w and|strong="H5971"\w* lies \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* utter.

\w In|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H1697"\w* wrath make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w end|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H1697"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* people, \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* earth, \w may|strong="H8193"\w* know \w that|strong="H1697"\w* God rules \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w At|strong="H3045"\w* evening \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w*, howling \w like|strong="H2534"\w* dogs, \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* round \w in|strong="H4910"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* city.

\w They|strong="H5892"\w* roam \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* feast, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* snarl, if \w they|strong="H5892"\w* \w get|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* fill.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* might; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* ring \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* love \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* morning. \w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H5128"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sure refuge, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* retreat \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* day \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* trouble.

\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sure retreat, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w faithful|strong="H2617"\w* God.
